summary: Chef with nine years of culinary experience and eleven total years of hotel experience. Skilled in leading and raising banquet quality of food, with a track record of improving food scores and delivering high-profile events. Experienced in menu development, team leadership, and collaborating with consulting firms to enhance performance.

experience.title: Senior Sous Chef
experience.description: Oversee three different outlets; improved Restaurant Quality of Food by 6 points in 2 years; developed menus for breakfast, lunch and dinner; achieved 87 for Associate Engagement Survey; worked closely with Carpedia (consulting firm); currently managing 3 managers and over 60 associates; $15.6 million in food sales for 2016.

experience.title: Sous Chef
experience.description: Oversaw the PM culinary operations; improved quality of food scores by 3 points during first year on the job; trained and developed new Assistant Sous Chef and lead cook; assisted the Chef in achieving not only GSS goals but also financial targets.

experience.title: Assistant Sous Chef
experience.description: Made schedules; scored an 82 on the AES survey; bridged the gap between AM and PM; attended WIG sessions; won silver medal in the NOWFE competition; contributed to menu development.

experience.title: Kitchen Supervisor
experience.description: Oversaw the AM shift; part of a renovation (M Club); did scheduling and ordering for the hotel restaurant.

experience.title: Banquet Cook 2 (Lead Cook)
experience.description: Attended daily BEO meetings; prepped and fired functions for upwards of 1500 guests; prepared tastings for VIP clients; delegated prep lists and daily cleaning lists to the team.
